metadata.title: CVE-2017-15019 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
LAME 3.99.5 has a NULL Pointer Dereference in the hip_decode_init functionwithin libmp3lame/mpglib_interface.c via a malformed mpg file, because ofan incorrect calloc call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15019` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lame - 3.100-2
libmp3lame0 - 3.100-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lame package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
